lead_paragraph: If combined, the two cable operators may have enough firepower to pursue a new “friendly” consolidation with Time Warner Cable.

headline.print_headline: Charter and Bright House Renew Their Merger Plans
headline.main: Charter and Bright House Pursuing Merger Even After Comcast’s Failed Deal

snippet: If combined, the two cable operators may have enough firepower to pursue a new “friendly” consolidation with Time Warner Cable.
abstract: Charter Communications is planning to buy Bright House Networks for $10.4 billion; deal is expected to presage pursuit of Time Warner Cable.
